attributes.action: Improve the state school system by reducing class size, increasing the number of teachers and doubling the money invested.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many children leaving state schools are unable to read. The level of education within the state school system could be improved to that achieved in the independent sector by simply reducing the class size (20 pupils max.); increasing the number of teachers and by doubling the amount of money invested per child.
